name: Pork Barbecue
description: Juicy grilled pork skewers marinated in a sweet and savory sauce.

name: Chicken Isaw
description: Grilled chicken intestines seasoned with spices for a flavorful street food experience.

name: Dugo (Pig's blood)
description: Rich and creamy pig's blood stew, a Filipino delicacy often enjoyed with rice.

name: Pork Isaw
description: Grilled pork intestines skewered and seasoned to perfection, a classic street food favorite.

name: Lugaw
description: Warm and comforting rice porridge topped with flavorful garlic, ginger, and crispy fried shallots.

name: Goto
description: A hearty rice porridge with tender beef tripe and ginger-infused broth, perfect for cold days.

name: Arroz Caldo
description: Filipino-style chicken and rice soup simmered in a flavorful broth with garlic and ginger.

name: Palabok
description: Thin rice noodles topped with a rich and savory shrimp sauce, boiled eggs, and crispy fried garlic.

name: Pancit
description: Stir-fried noodles with a medley of vegetables with meat and seafood, a Filipino party staple.

name: Halo-Halo
description: A delightful Filipino dessert made with a mix of shaved ice, sweetened beans, fruits, and various toppings.

name: Ice Scramble
description: A colorful frozen treat made with shaved ice, milk, sugar, and flavorings, topped with sweetened condensed milk and toppings.

name: Mais con Yelo
description: Sweet corn kernels layered with shaved ice, milk, and sugar, a refreshing and creamy summer dessert.

name: Saging con Yelo
description: Ripe banana slices served with crushed ice and sweetened milk, a simple yet satisfying dessert.

name: Melon Ice Candy
description: Homemade frozen treat made with fresh melon juice, sugar, and milk, a favorite snack during hot summer days.

name: Chocolate Ice Candy
description: Indulgent frozen dessert made with rich chocolate milk, frozen to perfection for a delightful treat.

name: Kwek-Kwek (4pcs)
description: Deep-fried quail eggs coated in an orange-colored batter, a popular Filipino street food snack.

name: Kikiam (6pcs)
description: Savory Chinese-inspired street food made with ground pork and vegetables wrapped in bean curd sheets.

name: Fishball (10pcs)
description: Deep-fried fish balls served on skewers with a sweet and spicy sauce, a favorite street food snack.

name: Chicken Balls (4pcs)
description: Tender chicken meatballs seasoned with herbs and spices, perfect for dipping in your favorite sauce.

name: Gulaman
description: Refreshing gelatin cubes served in sweetened syrup, a classic Filipino beverage to beat the heat.
